remarks: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. Variant of ~ rspcdv .  (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2019.)
statement:
rspcedvd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
rspcedvd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rspcedvd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
rspcedvd $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. B ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
